H0.text: The Vectis National Party was a political party formed in 1967 which campaigned for crown dependency for which island. Jersey

H1.text: The Vectis National Party was a political party formed in 1967 which campaigned for crown dependency for which island. Guernsey

H2.text: The Vectis National Party was a political party formed in 1967 which campaigned for crown dependency for which island. Isle of Man

H3.text: The Vectis National Party was a political party formed in 1967 which campaigned for crown dependency for which island. IoW

A4.text: The party sought Crown dependency status for the Isle of Wight, on a similar model to certain other islands including the Isle of Man.

A5.text: The party was motivated by a belief that the sale of the Isle of Wight to the English crown in 1293 was unconstitutional.
